Jx.Store.Strategy

Extends: Jx.Object

Base class for all Jx.Store strategies

Summary
Jx.Store.StrategyExtends: Jx.Object
Properties
storeThe store this strategy is associated with
activewhether this strategy has been activated or not.
Functions
setStoreAssociates this strategy with a particular store.
activateactivates the strategy if it isn’t already active.
deactivatedeactivates the strategy if it is already active.

Properties

store

The store this strategy is associated with

active

whether this strategy has been activated or not.

Functions

setStore

setStore: function (store)

Associates this strategy with a particular store.

activate

activate: function ()

activates the strategy if it isn’t already active.

deactivate

deactivate: function ()

deactivates the strategy if it is already active.

Base class for all other object in the JxLib framework.
setStore: function (store)
Associates this strategy with a particular store.
activate: function ()
activates the strategy if it isn’t already active.
deactivate: function ()
deactivates the strategy if it is already active.
